name: Petrofac Limited
description: Petrofac Limited is a leading international service provider to the oil and gas production and processing industry, with a strong emphasis on delivering innovative solutions that improve operational efficiency and profitability for its clients. Founded in 1981 and headquartered in St Helier, Jersey, Petrofac operates in various regions including the Middle East, Europe, Africa, and Asia. The company offers a wide range of services, including engineering, procurement, construction, and project management, as well as asset management and operations support. Petrofac is committed to sustainability and strives to minimize environmental impact while maximizing energy efficiency through its solutions. The company has worked on numerous high-profile projects, partnering with major oil and gas companies to deliver complex infrastructure and facilities that meet the evolving needs of the energy sector. With a focus on safety, quality, and integrity, Petrofac is dedicated to maintaining the highest standards in all its operations while fostering a culture of innovation and collaboration among its workforce.

seo.meta_title: Petrofac Limited | Oil and Gas Services Provider
seo.meta_description: Explore Petrofac Limited, a leading provider of services to the oil and gas industry. Discover our commitment to innovation, safety, and sustainability.

faq.question: What services does Petrofac provide?
faq.answer: Petrofac provides engineering, procurement, construction, and project management services to the oil and gas industry.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Petrofac?
faq.answer: Sami Iskander is the CEO of Petrofac Limited.

faq.question: Where is Petrofac headquartered?
faq.answer: Petrofac is headquartered in St Helier, Jersey.
